form.name: form1

a.span: The Big Walnut Local School District will be accepting Interdistrict and Intradistrict applications from April 28-May 1, 2020.

h3.span: District Mental Health Brief - Mental Health Monday 4.27.20

span.style: color: #272727; font-family: futura-pt, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: Having trouble sleeping? Do you feel like your mind is running and you can't stop? Stress and anxiety can cause our focus to become too active. Our latest Mental Health Brief -

span.style: color: #272727; font-family: futura-pt, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff
color: #272727; font-family: futura-pt, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: has been posted. To access current and previous articles, which are shared every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, take a look at our Mental Health/Behavioral Services site by visiting www.bwls.net and select "Mental Health/Behavioral Services" under the "Parents/Community" menu. Stay well, Big Walnut!

span.style: color: #272727; font-family: futura-pt, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: As you have probably heard by now, Governor DeWine announced yesterday that he has closed school buildings for the remainder of the year.

div.span: The Big Walnut Local Schools are hosting a virtual board meeting, Thursday, April 16, 2020. The virtual board meeting is slated to begin at 6:30 pm.

If you have not already had your appointment to drop off paperwork and sign enrollment papers, we will be scheduling a time for you when we are able to return to the office. You will be contacted by phone to make the appointment. We look forward to completing this process with you soon!

div.br:
110 Tippett Court
Sunbury, OH 43074
Phone 740.965.3010
Fax 740.965.4688
